Past Meeting Notess

Here you can find the full repository of notes from previous UQRUG Meetings.
Click the Search Icon in the top right to search all posts.

UQRUG 43

Overview: Supervised Machine Learning in R.
Questions: None!
October 25, 2023

UQRUG 42

Overview: Parallization in R.
Questions: parallels, HPC, memory utilisation, detectCores, for loops
September 27, 2023

UQRUG 41

Overview: Basic Statistics in R.
Questions: stats, network analysis, NetCDF, spatial, normality of residuals, intra class correlations, plotting multiple linear regression, reverse geocoding, LD Analysis with genepop
August 30, 2023

UQRUG 40

Overview: Using quarto and revealjs to create presentations with R markdown.
Questions: learning about knitr, combining shiny with quarto, fixing OneDrive breaking R, cmdstanr, brms
July 26, 2023

UQRUG 39

Overview: Using data.table for fast data manipulation.
Questions: data.table and for loops, csv vs xlsx, LMER, keeping code tidy and readable, standard R operators, using .RData files, storing descriptive stats in a matrix, mutating all cells in dataframe, HPC help, RMarkdown errors
June 28, 2023

UQRUG 38

Overview: Using R for Mailouts.
Questions: Reloading packages, Combining multiple tables/kables, using HedgeDoc, using overlead for theses, formatting data for population genetics analysis
May 31, 2023

UQRUG 37

Overview: AI assisted coding.
Questions: Regular Expressions, data.table complete() equivalent, filtering outliers, boxplots, RStudio new line bug
April 26, 2023

UQRUG 36

Overview: Websites with Quarto.
Questions: Bayesian Stats, glm(), R Markdown, Functional Programming, Code debugging
March 29, 2023
